original_text: So Ahab went away to eat and to drink. But Elijah climbed to the top of Mount Carmel. He bent low down towards the ground. He put his face between his knees.
korean_text: 아합이 먹고 마시러 올라가니라 엘리야가 갈멜 산 꼭대기로 올라가서 땅에 꿇어 엎드려 그의 얼굴을 무릎 사이에 넣고

sentences.original_text: So Ahab went away to eat
But Elijah climbed to the top of Mount Carmel
He bent low down towards the ground
He put his face between his knees
